title: Masquerade in Bridal Attire and Marry the Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Arranged Marriage   Cold Love Interests   Cross-dressing   Cruel Characters   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Politics   Schemes And Conspiracies   Unlucky Protagonist   Unrequited Love
author: 小栗影儿
description:
The fifth young lord of the Du Mansion has no choice but to replace his sister as the bride. He plans to disguise his true identity with his wit against the crown prince, but to his surprise, on the night of their wedding…
Yuxing Tianrui, “You’re merely a stand-in!”
Du Chuxuan, “…” He figured already? >
